When Simon walked into his boss’ office, he saw him “getting cozy” with his wife. Simon turned furious. But he couldn’t do anything. The boss threatened to fire both of them if they tried anything. So, Simon just walked out. 

Yet, the next time he saw his boss, he’d be lying unconscious on the floor. And Simon would be the primary suspect in the murder.

Video_name: New Era of High-Speed Travel || വന്ദേ ഭാരത് എക്‌സ്പ്രസ് കണ്ണൂരിൽ എത്തി: അതിവേഗ യാത്രയുടെ പുതിയ യുഗം
Video_description:
@Weekly_News_Digest The train covered the distance of approximately 600 kilometers in just 7 hours and 10 minutes, showcasing its exceptional speed and efficiency. presenting this video joining with people of Kerala, on the arrival of 'The Vande Bharat Express,' India's fastest train to Kannur!!!  
 As we traveled from Kollam to Kannur, it used to take us almost 12 to 14 hours to reach our destination, making this moment particularly auspicious for us. The introduction of the Vande Bharat Express is a significant step towards improving the connectivity of rural areas and promoting tourism to the breathtaking destinations in Kannur and other parts of Kerala. This new high-speed train service marks a great beginning for enhancing transportation infrastructure and boosting economic growth in the region.  The train covered the distance of approximately 600 kilometers in just 7 hours and 10 minutes, showcasing its exceptional speed and efficiency.

The train arrived at each station promptly at the scheduled time, demonstrating its punctuality and reliability. please refer back to the video to know the exact timing.

content credit to Mathrubhumi News
